name: Pit Stop Idle
description:
Ready, set, go!
It's you vs. time! Prepare your crew and get ready to perform your best before the next car arrives! Lift the vehicle, change the wheels, grow your team and complete all the tasks before getting back to the race!
developers: CHEF GAME STUDIO YAZILIM TEKNOLOJILERI LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: CHEF GAME STUDIO YAZILIM TEKNOLOJILERI LIMITED SIRKETI
